channel.title: 2 Worlds
channel.description: hey does sum1 knows how to make 2 worlds in a server cuz i want 1 world of normal and second one for spawning how do i set that you need to make 2 account 1 for each??????

item.title: 2 Worlds
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

[quote=“Xi ShiFt iX, post:6, topic:449221”]I don’t know the real way to do it,

but I open Port 5555 and make a new client but of course you can try and
make another button on the client one which says:
World 1
and
World 2.
and make it connect to your ip on port 5555[/quote]

i want that kind wen u go to login screen then you can choose witch world u want how do i do that

Read full topic

item.title: 2 Worlds
item.dc:creator: @Xi_ShiFt_iX Xi ShiFt iX
item.description:
@Xi_ShiFt_iX wrote:

I don’t know the real way to do it,

but I open Port 5555 and make a new client but of course you can try and
make another button on the client one which says:
World 1
and
World 2.
and make it connect to your ip on port 5555
